sn34.11:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na samadhismim thitikusalo.
sn34.11:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim thitikusalo hoti, na samadhismim samapattikusalo.
sn34.11:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim thitikusalo.
sn34.11:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim thitikusalo ca.
sn34.11:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim thitikusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam aggo ca settho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
